blocks.name: evth2f
blocks.content: A version of ~ evth2 using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm evth2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  evth2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfral(s0, hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  ralbidv(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  breq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  cbvralf(hs1, s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfbr(s1, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cle)
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs1, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
  breq2d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s1), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
}

thm evth2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s1))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = ‚ãÉ c2
  ‚ä£ c3 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Comp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s1))), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` hs0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1))))
  evth2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` hs0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1))))
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` hs0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1)))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfral(s0, hs1, c0, (c1 ` hs0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1))
  nfbr(s0, (c1 ` hs0), cle, (c1 ` hs1))
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs1)
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  nfv(hs0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1)))
  ralbidv(hs1, c0, hs0 = s0, (c1 ` hs0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1))
  breq1d((c1 ` hs0), cle, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c1)
  rexbii(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s1)))
  cbvralf(hs1, s1, c0, (c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s1))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfbr(s1, (c1 ` s0), cle, (c1 ` hs1))
  nffv(s1, c1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, cle)
  nffv(s1, c1, hs1)
  nfcv(s1, hs1)
  nfv(hs1, (c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s1))
  breq2d((c1 ` s0), cle, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s1), hs1 = s1)
  fveq2(hs1, s1, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)

blocks.name: elunif
blocks.content: A version of ~ eluni using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

thm elunif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| diffcc(c0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), diffcc(c0, c1))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  eluni(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfel(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2w(hs0, s0, c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elunif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(c0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))), d(c0, c1))
  bitri(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c1, ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0,(c0 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  eluni(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, (c0 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  nfan(s0, c0 ‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfel(s0, c0, hs0)
  nfel(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, (c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s0, c0 ‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà s0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  eleq2w(hs0, s0, c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
}

thm fvelrnbf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  fvelrnb(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
}

  fvelrnb(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

}

blocks.name: rfcnpre1
blocks.content: If F is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values greater than a given extended real B is an open set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rfcnpre1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c1))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, c1, cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), w0)
  syl6eqr(cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), c0, crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), w0)
  eqrd(s0, cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), w0)
  nfima(s0, ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
  nfcnv(s0, c3)
  nfov(s0, c2, cioo, cpnf)
  nfcv(s0, cioo)
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  nfrab1(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wb(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c5, c3, cr, w0)
  baibd(w0, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, cxr))
  elioopnf(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)))), wf(c3, c5, cr), wfn(c3, c5))
  simpld(w0, wf(c3, c5, cr), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wf(c3, c5, cr), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)))
  sylancl(w0, wb(wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)), wa(wf(c3, c5, cr), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), c1)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cr)))
  sylanblrc(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c5, cuni(c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)))
  cntop1(c3, c1, c4)
  istopon(c1, c5)
  eqeltri(c4, cfv(ctopon, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopon()
  iscn(hs0, c1, c5, c4, cr, c3)
  ffn(c3, c5, cr)
  elpreima(c3, c5, cv(s0), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  rabid(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), c1), wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)), wcel(co(c2, cioo, cpnf), c4))
  eleqtrri(co(c2, cioo, cpnf), c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  iooretop(c2, cpnf)
  cnima(c3, c1, c4, co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

thm rfcnpre1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)

blocks.name: fcnre
blocks.content: A function continuous with respect to the standard topology, is a real mapping. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

thm fcnre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, ccn, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cr)), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c3, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  cntop1(c0, c3, c2)
  toptopon(c3, c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cr)))
  eqeltri(c2, cfv(ctopon, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopon()
  syl6eleq(c0, co(c3, ccn, c2), c4, w0)
  cnf2(c3, c1, c2, cr, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fcnre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c3
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c3[Cn]c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚Ñù), c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c2))
  sylib(w0, c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c3 ‚àà Top)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c2))
  cntop1(c0, c3, c2)
  toptopon(c3, c1)
  a1i(w0, c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚Ñù))

  3eqtr4rd(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c1), csb(s0, c0, c1), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1))))

  csbiedf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)

thm sumsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c1)= c2)

  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí c1 = c2)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c1), c2, (seq(1(+, { < 1, c2 > }))` 1), w0)

  sylancr(w0, ({ < 1, c0 > } : { 1 } ‚Üî { c0 }), 1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c0 ‚àà c3)

  fzsn(nat1)
  f1oeq2((1[...]1), { 1 }, { < 1, c0 > }, { c0 })

  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { c0 }, [c0 / s0]c1 = c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { c0 }, c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  3eqtr4rd(({ < 1, c2 > } ` hs1), [({ < 1, c0 > } ` hs1)/ s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà(1[...]1)))

  fveq2d({ < 1, c0 > }, hs1, nat1, hs1 ‚àà(1[...]1))
  sylancr(w0, ({ < 1, c0 > } ` 1)= c0, 1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c0 ‚àà c3)
  fvsng(nat1, cn, c0, c3)

  elfz1eq(hs1, nat1)
  seq1i(nat1, caddc, { < 1, c2 > }, c2, w0)

blocks.content: A version of ~ evth using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

thm evthf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))))

  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wnf(s0, w0))

  evth(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(wrex(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  rexbii(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  cbvralf(hs0, s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))

  nfv(hs0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  breq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c1)
  cbvrexf(hs1, s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfral(s0, s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s0, cle)

blocks.name: refsumcn
blocks.content: A finite sum of continuous real functions, from a common topological space, is continuous. The class expression for B normally contains free variables k and x to index it. See ~ fsumcn for the analogous theorem on continuous complex functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm refsumcn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, c4))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  syl6eleqr(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, c4), co(c3, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))))
  fsumcnf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), w0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr))))
  syl6eleq(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr)), co(c3, ccn, c4), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))

blocks.name: rfcnpre2
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values smaller than a given extended real ` B ` , is an open set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rfcnpre2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c1))

blocks.name: rfcnpre3
blocks.content: If F is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values greater than or equal to a given real B is a closed set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rfcnpre3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)))

  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c1))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c4, wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, cfv(ccld, c1), cima(ccnv(c2), co(c5, cico, cpnf)), w0)
  syl6eqr(cima(ccnv(c2), co(c5, cico, cpnf)), c0, crab(s0, c4, wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), w0)

  bitrd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), co(c5, cico, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c5, cico, cpnf))))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), co(c5, cico, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c5, cico, cpnf)))), wf(c2, c4, cr), wfn(c2, c4))
  ffn(c2, c4, cr)
  elpreima(c2, c4, cv(hs0), co(c5, cico, cpnf))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c5, cico, cpnf)), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))

  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wb(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c5, cico, cpnf)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf))), wcel(c5, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))

  simpr2(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf))
  3jca(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr))

  nfbr(s0, c5, cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, c5)

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), co(c5, cico, cpnf)), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c3)), wcel(co(c5, cico, cpnf), cfv(ccld, c3)))
  syl6eleqr(co(c5, cico, cpnf), cfv(ccld, c3), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c5, cico, cpnf), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(c5, cr))
  icopnfcld(c5)

  cnclima(c2, c1, c3, (c5[[,)]+‚àû))
  diff.hs0.c((`' c2 "(c5[[,)]+‚àû)))
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà c4 | c5[‚â§](c2 ` s0)})
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

blocks.name: rfcnpre4
blocks.content: If F is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values less than or equal to a given real B is a closed set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

thm rfcnpre4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  bitrd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), co(cmnf, cioc, c5))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c5)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(cmnf, cioc, c5))))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), co(cmnf, cioc, c5))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(cmnf, cioc, c5)))), wf(c2, c4, cr), wfn(c2, c4))
  ffn(c2, c4, cr)

  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wb(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(cmnf, cioc, c5)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c5))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(c5, cxr))
  mnfxr()

  rexrd(c5, w0)

  impbida(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c5)), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c5))
  simpr3(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c5))

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), co(cmnf, cioc, c5)), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c3)), wcel(co(cmnf, cioc, c5), cfv(ccld, c3)))
  syl6eleqr(co(cmnf, cioc, c5), cfv(ccld, c3), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(cmnf, cioc, c5), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(c5, cr))
  iocmnfcld(c5)
  fveq2i(ccld, c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))

  diff.hs0.w(w0)

blocks.name: sumpair
blocks.content: Sum of two distinct complex values. The class expression for ` A ` and ` B ` normally contain free variable ` k ` to index it. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumpair(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4), co(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2, csn(c0), csn(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), emptycls), wne(c0, c1))
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1))))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cfn))
  prfi(c0, c1)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  elpri(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  jaodan(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, cc))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, cc))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c4, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, cc))
  oveq12d(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, c4, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

thm sumpair(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum(s0 ‚àà { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c4)

} = {

  fsumsplit(s0, { c0, c1 }, c2, { c0 }, { c1 }, w0)
  syl(w0, ({ c0 } ‚ãÇ { c1 })= ‚àÖ, c0 ‚â† c1)

  a1i(w0, { c0, c1 } =({ c0 } ‚ãÉ { c1 }))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1 } ‚àà Fin)

  jaodan(w0, s0 = c0, s0 = c1, c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 = c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 = c0, c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 = c1, c4 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c2), caddc, sum(s0 ‚àà { c1 }, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)

  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)

blocks.name: rfcnnnub
blocks.content: Given a real continuous function ` F ` defined on a compact topological space, there is always a positive integer that is a strict upper bound of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rfcnnnub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmp))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, ccn, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))), wex(hs0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl(w0, wex(hs0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))), wex(hs0, w3a(wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cr), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cr)))))

blocks.name: refsum2cnlem1
blocks.content: This is the core Lemma for ~ refsum2cn : the sum of two continuous real functions (from a common topological space) is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: refsum2cn
blocks.content: The sum of two continuus real functions (from a common topological space) is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm refsum2cn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  refsum2cnlem1(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cmpt(hs0, cpr(nat1, nat2), cif(c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))), w0)
  nfmpt(s0, hs0, cpr(nat1, nat2), cif(c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), nat1)))
  nfcv(s0, cpr(nat1, nat2))
  nfif(s0, c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpr(nat1, nat2), cif(c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, nat1, nat2)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 0un

thm ndisj2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr2i(wn(wdisj(s0, c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))))))

  rexbii(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))))
  bitr3i(wn(wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wrex(s1, c0, wn(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))))
  rexnal(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  rexbii(s1, c0, wn(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  bitr4i(wn(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wa(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wn(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))))
  ioran(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  anbi12i(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wn(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))
  df-ne(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  df-ne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)
}

thm ndisj2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr2i(¬¨ ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ))), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ))))
  notbii(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ))))

  bitr3i(¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)))

  bitr4i(¬¨(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ), (s0 ‚â† s1 ‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), (¬¨ s0 = s1 ‚àß ¬¨(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ))
  ioran(s0 = s1, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)
  anbi12i(s0 ‚â† s1, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, ¬¨ s0 = s1, ¬¨(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: zenom
blocks.content: The set of integer numbers is equinumerous to omega (the set of finite ordinal numbers). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: uzwo4

blocks.name: unisn0
blocks.content: The union of the singleton of the empty set is the empty set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: disjiun2
blocks.content: In a disjoint collection, an indexed union is disjoint from an additional term. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

}

  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c3))), wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)))

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c2)

  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` s0)))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 `(s0[+]1))))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` hs0))
  diff.wss.s(s0, (c0 ` c1), (c0 ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Inclusion relation for a monotonic sequence of sets. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)

thm ssdec(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfzo, c1))), wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))))
  jca(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1)))

  3jca(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  syl(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))

  leidd(c1, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eluzelz(c1, c2)
  fzind(hs0, s0, c2, c1, c1, wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))

  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2))))
  ssidd(cfv(c0, c2), w0)
  3exp(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0, wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sstrd(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), w3a(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0))

  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfzo, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  3jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0))))
  3jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))
  simplll(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), w0)
  simplr1(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), w0)
  simplr2(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), w0)
  eluz2(cv(s0), c2)
  simpllr(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), w0)
  simplr3(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), w0)
  elfzo2(cv(s0), c2, c1)
  3adant1(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)), w0, wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))))
  simpr(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0)
  simpl(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0)
  pm3.35(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm ssdec(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c2[..^]c1))‚Üí(c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2), ((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]c1 ‚àß c1[‚â§]c1)))
  jca(w0, (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]c1 ‚àß c1[‚â§]c1))
  jca(w0, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  eluzel2(c1, c2)
  3jca(w0, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2[‚â§]c1, c1[‚â§]c1)
  syl(w0, c2[‚â§]c1, c1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  eluzle(c1, c2)
  leidd(c1, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  eluzelz(c1, c2)
  fzind(hs0, s0, c2, c1, c1, (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` hs0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c2)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c2, w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c2)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  sseq1d((c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, c0)
  imbi2d(hs0 = s0, w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  sseq1d((c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c0 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c0)
  imbi2d(hs0 =(s0[+]1), w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2), (c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  sseq1d((c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c0 `(s0[+]1)), hs0 =(s0[+]1))
  fveq2(hs0, (s0[+]1), c0)
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  sseq1d((c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  a1i((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]c1), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c2)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  ssidd((c0 ` c2), w0)
  3exp(((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), w0, (c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  sstrd((c0 `(s0[+]1)), (c0 ` c2), (c0 ` s0), (((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1))‚àß(w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))‚àß w0))
  3adant2(((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), w0, (c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` s0))
  syl2anc((((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1))‚àß w0), (c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` s0), w0, s0 ‚àà(c2[..^]c1))
  simpr(((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1)), w0)
  sylibr((((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1))‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà(c2[..^]c1), (s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2)‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s0[<]c1))
  3jca((((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1))‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s0[<]c1)
  sylibr((((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1))‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0))
  3jca((((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1))‚àß w0), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2[‚â§]s0)
  simplll(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1), w0)
  simplr1((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2[‚â§]s0, s0[<]c1, w0)
  simplr2((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2[‚â§]s0, s0[<]c1, w0)
  eluz2(s0, c2)
  simpllr(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1), w0)
  simplr3((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2[‚â§]s0, s0[<]c1, w0)
  elfzo2(s0, c2, c1)
  3adant1(((c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2[‚â§]s0 ‚àß s0[<]c1)), (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), w0, (c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  syl2anc(((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))‚àß w0), (c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2), w0, (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  simpr((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), w0)
  simpl((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)), w0)
  pm3.35(w0, (c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c2)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` s0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(s0[+]1))‚äÜ(c0 ` c2)))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚äÜ(c0 ` c2))
  diff.wss.s(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c2)

blocks.name: elixpconstg
blocks.content: Membership in an infinite Cartesian product of a constant ` B ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elixpconstg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3)))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3), wa(wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  simp2bi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)‚äÜ c3)

  simpr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2))

thm iunincfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1),(c2 ` s0))=(c2 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[..^]c1))‚Üí(c2 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(s0[+]1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqssd(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1),(c2 ` s0)), (c2 ` c1), w0)

  eliun(s0, hs0, (c0[...]c1), (c2 ` s0))
  imp(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1), hs0 ‚àà(c2 ` s0)), hs0 ‚àà(c2 ` c1))

  sseldd(hs0, (c2 ` c1), (c2 ` s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2 ` s0)))
  3adant3(w0, s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1), hs0 ‚àà(c2 ` s0), (c2 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 ` c1))

  elfzuz3(s0, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1))‚àß hs1 ‚àà(s0[..^]c1)), (c2 ` hs1)‚äÜ(c2 `(hs1[+]1)), w0, hs1 ‚àà(c0[..^]c1))
  simpll(w0, s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1), hs1 ‚àà(s0[..^]c1))

thm rexanuz3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {

} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w3, w4))))
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w3, w4))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), w3)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), w4))))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(w1 ‚àß w2)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), w4)))
  ‚ä£ (s1 = s0 ‚Üí(w3 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ (s1 = s0 ‚Üí(w4 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(w1 ‚àß w2)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4))))
  sylibr(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4))), (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), w3))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), w4))))

  ex(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4))‚Üí(w1 ‚àß w2)))
  ex((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4)), (w1 ‚àß w2))
  adantll(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4)), (w1 ‚àß w2))
  syl2anc((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4))), (w1 ‚àß w2), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4)))
  adantr(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4)), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0))
  3syl(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  biimpi(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1))
  eleq2i(s0, c0, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1))
  eluzelz(s0, c1)
  uzid(s0)
  simpr(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(w3 ‚àß w4)))

  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)=(s2 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3)

thm eliuniin(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))))

  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))))
  mpd(wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  sylbb(wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  reximdv(s0, c3, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))

  eliin(s1, c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5), c4, c5)
  rexlimdv3a(s0, c3, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)), wcel(c0, c2))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  3imp3i2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  eliin(s1, c0, c1, c4, c5)
  rspe(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  eliun(s0, c0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))
  eleq2i(c0, c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)

  simp2(c0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà c5))

  sylibr(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))))
  mpd(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))

  ancld(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))

  a1d(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))

blocks.origin:
thm nssd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  sylc(w0, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1))))
  jca(w0, wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  spcegv(hs0, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  nss(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nssd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  sylc(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1)), c2 ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1))
  jca(w0, c2 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1)
  spcegv(hs0, c2, c0, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c1)
  nss(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: iineq12dv

blocks.name: supxrcld
blocks.content: The supremum of an arbitrary set of extended reals is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: elrestd
blocks.content: A sufficient condition for being an open set of a subspace topology. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrestd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cin(c5, c2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2))))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(c5, c1), wceq(c0, cin(c5, c2)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c5, c2)))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c5, c1, c0, cin(c5, c2), cin(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c5, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)))), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c4))
  elrest(hs0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c5, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elrestd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c5 ‚ãÇ c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, c0 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, c0 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)), c5 ‚àà c1, c0 =(c5 ‚ãÇ c2))
  a1i(w0, c0 =(c5 ‚ãÇ c2))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c5, c1, c0, (c5 ‚ãÇ c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))
  ineq1(hs0, c5, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, c0 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))), c1 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c4)
  elrest(hs0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c5 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: eliuniincex
blocks.content: Counterexample to show that the additional conditions in ~ eliuniin and ~ eliuniin2 are actually needed. Notice that the definition of ` A ` is not even needed (it can be any class). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliuniincex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c2, csn(emptycls))
  -| wceq(c3, emptycls)
  -| wceq(c4, emptycls)
  -| wceq(c0, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mp2an(wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))
  eqneltri(c0, c1, universe)
  nvel(c1)
  mp2an(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))), wcel(emptycls, c2), wral(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4)))
  eleqtrri(emptycls, c2, csn(emptycls))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  ral0(s1, wcel(c0, c4))
  rspce(s0, emptycls, c2, wral(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4)), wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))
  nfral(s0, s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4))
  nfel(s0, c0, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  a1i(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)), wral(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4))))
  raleqi(s1, c3, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4))
  sylibr(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))), wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wa(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))), wn(wcel(c0, c1)))))
  olcd(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wa(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))), wn(wcel(c0, c1))))
  pm3.22(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))
  xor(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliuniincex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ¬¨(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)))
  ‚ä£ c2 = { ‚àÖ }
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚àÖ
  ‚ä£ c4 = ‚àÖ
  ‚ä£ c0 = ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  mp2an(¬¨(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)))
  eqneltri(c0, c1, universe)
  nvel(c1)
  mp2an(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)), ‚àÖ ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà c4))
  eleqtrri(emptycls, c2, { ‚àÖ })
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  ral0(s1, c0 ‚àà c4)
  rspce(s0, emptycls, c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà c4), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))
  nfral(s0, s1, emptycls, c0 ‚àà c4)
  nfel(s0, c0, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  a1i(s0 = ‚àÖ, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà c4)))
  raleqi(s1, c3, emptycls, c0 ‚àà c4)
  sylibr((¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))), ¬¨(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)))‚à®(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)))
  olcd((¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))), (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4))‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1))
  pm3.22(¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)))
  xor(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4)))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: eliincex
blocks.content: Counterexample to show that the additional conditions in ~ eliin and ~ eliin2 are actually needed. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliincex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, emptycls)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  mp2an(wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))
  eqneltri(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2), universe)
  nvel(ciin(s0, c1, c2))
  mpbir(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)), wral(s0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c2)))
  ral0(s0, wcel(c0, c2))
  raleqi(s0, c1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c2))
  sylibr(wa(wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2))), wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))))))
  olcd(wa(wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)))))
  pm3.22(wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))
  xor(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliincex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2))
  ‚ä£ c0 = ùïå
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚àÖ
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)), d(s0, c0))
  mp2an(¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2))
  eqneltri(c0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), universe)
  nvel(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  mpbir(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà c2))
  ral0(s0, c0 ‚àà c2)
  raleqi(s0, c1, emptycls, c0 ‚àà c2)
  sylibr((¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)), ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)), ((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2))‚à®(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))))
  olcd((¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)), (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)))
  pm3.22(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2))
  xor(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: eliinid
blocks.content: Membership in an indexed intersection implies membership in any intersected set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: abssf
blocks.content: Class abstraction in a subclass relationship. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: fexd
blocks.content: If the domain of a mapping is a set, the function is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: supxrubd
blocks.content: A member of a set of extended reals is less than or equal to the set's supremum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: ssrabf
blocks.content: Subclass of a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssrabf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wss(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0)), wss(c0, cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))))
  sseq2i(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  df-rab(s0, c1, w0)
  ssabf(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
  3bitr2ri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  anbi1i(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  dfss3f(s0, c0, c1)
  r19.26(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)
  df-ral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssrabf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(c0 ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)), c0 ‚äÜ { s0 |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)}, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))))
  sseq2i(c0, { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, { s0 |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)})

  anbi1i(c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c1))
  dfss3f(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: eliin2
blocks.content: Membership in indexed intersection. See ~ eliincex for a counterexample showing that the precondition ` B =/= (/) ` cannot be simply dropped. ~ eliin uses an alternative precondition (and it doesn't have a disjoint var constraint between ` B ` and ` x ` ; see ~ eliin2f ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: ssrab2f
blocks.content: Subclass relation for a restricted class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: restuni3
blocks.content: The underlying set of a subspace induced by the subspace operator ` |``t ` . The result can be applied, for instance, to topologies and sigma-algebras. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm restuni3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
} = {

  sylibr(w0, wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)), wral(hs0, cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1))))

thm restuni3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1)=(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), (‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1)‚äÜ(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), w0, hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1)), hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2))
  biimpi(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), (‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2)‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1))))
  rexlimdv(hs2, (c0[|`t]c1), w0, hs0 ‚àà hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  3exp(w0, hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  3adant3(w0, hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)), hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1))
  simpr(w0, hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1))
  adantr(w0, hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), (hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1))))
  syl2anc(w0, (hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1))), c0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c3)
  elrest(hs1, c0, c2, c1, c3, hs2)
  reximdv(hs1, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs2), hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1), hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1))
  3ad2ant3(w0, hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2, (hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)))
  ex(hs0 ‚àà hs2, hs2 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1), hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1))

  sylibr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1)), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2))
  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1)), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1))
  sylib(hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0)
  elinel1(hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, c1)
  eluni2(hs1, hs0, c0)
  rexlimdv(hs1, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1)), hs0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2))

  syl2anc(((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1))‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà hs1), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà hs2), (hs1 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ‚àà(hs1 ‚ãÇ c1))

thm eliuniin2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))))
  mpd(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  sylbb(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  reximdv(s0, c3, wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  a1i(wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))))
  ibi(wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  eliin(s1, c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4), c0, c4)
  rexlimd(s0, c3, wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c2))
  nfne(s0, c0, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c1, c2))
  3exp(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c2))
  sylibr(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  sylibr(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  3imp3i2an(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  simp2(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  biimpar(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  eliin2(s1, c0, c1, c4)
  rspe(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  eliun(s0, c1, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))
  eleq2i(c1, c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliuniin2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4)))
  mpd(c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)))
  sylbb(c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)), c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)))
  reximdv(s0, c3, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4))
  a1i(c1 ‚àà c2, (c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4)))
  ibi(c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4))
  eliin(s1, c1, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4), c0, c4)
  rexlimd(s0, c3, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4), c1 ‚àà c2)
  nfne(s0, c0, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  nfv(s0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  3exp(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4), c1 ‚àà c2)
  sylibr((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4)), c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)))
  sylibr((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4)), c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)))
  3imp3i2an(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)), s0 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4))
  simp2(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4))
  biimpar(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4), c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4))
  eliin2(s1, c0, c1, c4)
  rspe(s0, c3, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4))
  eliun(s0, c1, c3, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4))
  eleq2i(c1, c2, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÇ(s1 ‚àà c0, c4)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: restuni4
blocks.content: The underlying set of a subspace induced by the ` |``t ` operator. The result can be applied, for instance, to topologies and sigma-algebras. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm restuni4(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), c1, cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(cuni(c0), c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  incom(c1, cuni(c0))
  sylib(w0, wceq(c1, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
  dfss(c1, cuni(c0))
  restuni3(c0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  ssexd(c1, cuni(c0), universe, w0)
  uniexd(c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restuni4(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1)= c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), c1, (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0), (‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0)=(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  incom(c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  sylib(w0, c1 =(c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0), c1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  dfss(c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  restuni3(c0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  ssexd(c1, ‚ãÉ c0, universe, w0)
  uniexd(c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: restuni6
blocks.content: The underlying set of a subspace topology. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm restuni6(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1), cuni(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), w0)
  unieqd(co(c0, crest, c1), co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
  restin(c0, c2, c1, c3, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  restuni4(c0, cin(c1, cuni(c0)), c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)))
  inss2(c1, cuni(c0))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  incom(c1, cuni(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restuni6(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1)=(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c1), (‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1), ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t](c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0)), (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0), w0)
  unieqd((c0[|`t]c1), (c0[|`t](c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[|`t]c1)=(c0[|`t](c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0)), c0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c3)
  restin(c0, c2, c1, c3, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  restuni4(c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0), c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  inss2(c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c0)=(‚ãÉ c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  incom(c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
}

blocks.name: iinssiin
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssiin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(c1, c2))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfii1(s0, c0, c1)
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), c2, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c1, c2))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eliinid(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, c2)
  dfss3(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssiin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c2)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  sylibr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  nfel(s0, hs0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfii1(s0, c0, c1)
  ex((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)), s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  sseldd(hs0, c2, c1, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  adantll(w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  eliinid(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  ax-mp((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, hs0, universe, c0, c2)
  dfss3(hs0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
}

blocks.name: iinssd
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c0), wss(c4, c2))
  rspcev(s0, c3, c0, wss(c4, c2), wss(c1, c2))
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  iinss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c3 ‚Üí c1 = c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl(w0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl2anc(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), c3 ‚àà c0, c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  rspcev(s0, c3, c0, c4 ‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, s0 = c3)
  iinss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: ralimda
blocks.content: Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralimda(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
} = {
  ex(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2))
  ralrimia(s0, c0, wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)), w2)
  nfan(s0, w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
  nfra1(s0, c0, w1)
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
  adantlr(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  id(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantll(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  rspa(s0, c0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralimda(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w2)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üí w2))
} = {
  ex(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w2))
  ralrimia(s0, c0, (w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)), w2)
  nfan(s0, w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1))
  nfra1(s0, c0, w1)
  sylc(((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1))‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), w2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), w1)
  adantlr(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1), s0 ‚àà c0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  id((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  adantll(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1), s0 ‚àà c0, w1)
  rspa(s0, c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: iinssf
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2, wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  syl5bi(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, c1)
  syl(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  reximi(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ssel(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  r19.36vf(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl5bi(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1))
  ax-mp((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, hs0, universe, c0, c1)
  syl(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  reximi(s0, c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2))
  ssel(c1, c2, hs0)
  r19.36vf(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  nfel(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iinssdf
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c2))
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c0), wss(c4, c2))
  rspcef(s0, c3, c0, wss(c4, c2), wss(c1, c2))
  nfss(s0, c4, c2)
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  iinssf(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c3 ‚Üí c1 = c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚äÜ c2)
} = {
  syl(w0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚äÜ c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl2anc(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), c3 ‚àà c0, c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  rspcef(s0, c3, c0, c4 ‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  nfss(s0, c4, c2)
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, s0 = c3)
  iinssf(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
